context: F5, Inc. is a application delivery and security company focused on load balancing, application security, and multi-cloud networking. Acquired NGINX and Shape Security. Cloud-native focus.

competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Dominant networking and cybersecurity player with comprehensive cloud security and application delivery solutions

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks
competitors.notes: Advanced cybersecurity with cloud security and AI-driven security analytics

competitors.name: Akamai Technologies
competitors.notes: Content delivery and cloud security leader with edge platform for secure digital experiences

competitors.name: Cloudflare
competitors.notes: Global web infrastructure, CDN, and DDoS mitigation provider

competitors.name: Citrix ADC (NetScaler)
competitors.notes: Application delivery controller competing in ADC market

competitors.name: A10 Networks
competitors.notes: Application delivery and security solutions with cloud-native capabilities

competitors.name: Imperva
competitors.notes: WAF with flexible deployment across on-premises, AWS, Azure, and GCP

competitors.name: AWS (Elastic Load Balancer)
competitors.notes: Cloud-native load balancing and application services

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure
competitors.notes: Azure Application Gateway and Azure Front Door for application delivery

competitors.name: Fortinet
competitors.notes: Security and networking solutions including web application firewalls
